scripts.build-library: cd ../library && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.build-all: npm run build-library && npm run build
scripts.build-and-serve: npm run build-library && npm run start
scripts.link-all: cd ../library && npm link && npm link ../consumer/node_modules/react && npm link ../consumer/node_modules/react-dom && cd ../consumer && npm link tree-shaking-lecture
